defaultItem.title: TinaCMS by the numbers
defaultItem.description: TinaCMS is an open-source content management system that allows developers to create and manage content for their websites and applications. It provides a flexible and customizable framework for building content-driven applications.

defaultItem.title: Start Building
defaultItem.description: Get started with TinaCMS today and take your content management to the next level.

fields.name: codeLanguage
fields.label: Code Language
fields.description: The language used for syntax highlighting.

fields.name: lightTheme
fields.label: Light Theme
fields.description: The light theme used for syntax highlighting.

fields.name: darkTheme
fields.label: Dark Theme
fields.description: The dark theme used for syntax highlighting.

fields.name: commandMap
fields.label: Command Map
fields.description:
A list of package managers and their corresponding commands, separated by "|". Example:
"npm|npm install
pnpm|pnpm install"

fields.label: Vertical Alignment
fields.name: verticalAlignment
fields.description: How content aligns vertically with the image (not applicable for center layout)

fields.label: Organization Logo
fields.name: logo
fields.description: Upload your organization logo (SVG recommended for best quality). Optimal size: 240x80px or similar aspect ratio.

fields.label: Logo Alt Text
fields.name: logoAlt
fields.description: Alternative text for the logo (important for accessibility and SEO)

fields.label: Organization Name
fields.name: name
fields.description: Full organization name - appears in footer copyright and as fallback text

fields.label: Header Color Theme
fields.name: color
fields.description: Color theme for header elements

fields.label: Navigation Menu
fields.name: nav
fields.description: Main website navigation structure

fields.label: Link URL
fields.name: href
fields.description: Relative path (e.g., /about) or external URL

fields.label: Display Label
fields.name: label
fields.description: Text shown in navigation menu

fields.label: Dropdown Menu Items
fields.name: submenu
fields.description: Optional dropdown items for this navigation link

fields.label: Social Media Links
fields.name: social
fields.description: Links to your organization's social media profiles

fields.label: Platform Name
fields.name: platform
fields.description: e.g., Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn

fields.label: Profile URL
fields.name: url
fields.description: Full URL to your profile page

fields.label: Quick Links Sections
fields.name: quickLinks
fields.description: Organized groups of footer links

fields.label: Section Title Key
fields.name: title
fields.description: Translation key for section heading (e.g., 'about', 'services')

fields.label: Translation Key
fields.name: label
fields.description: Translation key for link text

fields.label: Brand Theme
fields.name: theme
fields.description: Global visual styling and branding settings

fields.label: Primary Brand Color
fields.name: color
fields.description: Main color used throughout the website

fields.name: font
fields.label: Typography Family
fields.description: Font family for website content

fields.name: darkMode
fields.label: Dark Mode Setting
fields.description: How the website handles light/dark themes

fields.label: Google Maps Link
fields.name: mapsLink
fields.description: Full Google Maps URL or search query

fields.label: Video Call Link
fields.name: callLink
fields.description: Zoom, Teams, or other video call link

fields.label: Role
fields.name: role
fields.description: e.g., Host, Speaker, Facilitator

fields.label: Featured Event
fields.name: featured
fields.description: Highlight this event

fields.label: Type of Opportunity
fields.name: opportunityType
fields.description: Select the main category of opportunity

fields.label: Duration
fields.name: duration
fields.description: e.g., 3 months, 1 year

fields.label: Description
fields.name: description
fields.description: What it is, why it matters

fields.label: Responsibilities
fields.name: responsibilities
fields.description: Bulleted list or short paragraph

fields.label: Preferred Qualities
fields.name: preferredQualities
fields.description: Bulleted list or short paragraph

fields.label: Compensation Details
fields.name: details
fields.description: e.g., €3000/month salary, €15/hour, €500 stipend, Unpaid volunteer position, Travel reimbursement only

fields.label: How to Apply
fields.name: howToApply
fields.description: Instructions or link

fields.label: Job Description
fields.name: supportingDocument
fields.description: Upload PDF or DOCX file (job description, flyer, etc.)

fields.label: Values Alignment Statement
fields.name: valuesStatement
fields.description: DEI commitment, land acknowledgement, etc.

fields.label: External Link
fields.name: externalLink
fields.description: If this is a link to external content

fields.label: Link Description
fields.name: linkDescription
fields.description: Description of the external link

fields.label: Excerpt
fields.name: excerpt
fields.description: Brief summary for listings
